channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:20 Return the threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:20 Return the threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:07 Fragrant anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 08:07 Fragrant anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
